title: Email Settings
answer:
![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45427) 


 l   Adding an email account, On a home screen, touch **Email**. 

 −       Manual settings 

 1.         On the **Account setup** screen, input an account and a password. 

 2.         Touch **Manual setup**. 

 3.         Touch **POP3** and set the POP3 server. 

 4.         Touch **Next** and set the SMTP server. 

 5.         Touch **Next** and select email sending and receiving options. 

 6.         Touch **Next** and set **Your name** and **Give this account a name**. 

 7.         Touch **Next**. The inbox is displayed. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45415)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45416)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45417) 


 −       Automatic settings (Parameters about this type of email have been predefined on your phone.) 

 1.         On the **Account setup** screen, input an account and a password. 

 1.         Touch **Next**. 

 2.         Select email sending and receiving options. 

 3.         Touch **Next **and set **Your name** and **Give this account a name**. 

 4.         Touch **Next. **The inbox is displayed. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45420) 

 l   Sending an email 

 Touch **Email** > **Compose**. On the **Compose** screen, write an email and touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45421) 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45422) 

 l   Viewing/Deleting an email 

 On the **Inbox** screen, select and view an email. To delete an email, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45425). 

 l   Deleting an email account 

 Touch **Email** > ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45426) > **Settings**. Select the email you want to delete and touch **Remove account** in the **REMOVE ACCOUNT **field.
